mapper.insert: insert into auth_user(name, type, address, icon,introduce,product_id,description,good_at,score,status,update_date,user_id) values(#{name}, #{type}, #{address},#{icon}, #{introduce},#{product_id},#{description},#{good_at},#{score},#{status},now(),#{user_id})
mapper.select: select u.id,u.name,u.type,u.address,u.icon,u.introduce,u.product_id,u.description,u.good_at,u.score,u.status,DATE_FORMAT(u.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),DATE_FORMAT(u.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),u.user_id from company u order by u.create_date
select u.id,u.name,u.type,u.address,u.icon,u.introduce,u.product_id,u.description,u.good_at,u.score,u.status,u.update_date,u.create_date,u.user_id from company u where u.name = #{name}
